name: Sudoku Student
description:
Sudoku Student brings you the first Nintendo DSiWare Sudoku experience with all the features you'd expect! For "students" of Sudoku who are just getting their feet wet, Sudoku Student comes with a full tutorial. Once you’ve completed the tutorial, jump into simple and easy-going Sudoku puzzles. Designed for entry to beginner level players, you’ll find just the right amount of challenge to keep you hooked!

This game cannot be transferred from the Nintendo DSi to the Nintendo 3DS system. For more information, CLICK HERE >
